content.text: I love games, I am not a huge sports fan.
Me neither, I prefer to spend my time with my dog and my job.
I have a child, what's your favorite hobby?
I like to read about holistic health and natural remedies, so my favorite websites are those that focus on these topics.
I try to eat a lot of fruits and vegetables, but I'm not the best at it.
I'm not a big fan of vegetables, but I do like to grow them in my garden.
I'm afraid of heights, but I love to fly model airplanes.
That's interesting, I'm terrified of crashing my model airplane!
I try to avoid heights at all costs, but I'm working on getting over my fear.
I'm glad to hear that you're working on it, I know it's not easy
